title: my russian captor
description: After losing her job and then walking in on her boyfriend cheating on her, Cheyenne packed up everything she owned, put it all in storage; and left for a week vacation to Costa Rica. Things only got worse for her as she was captured and sold into the Russian sex trade business. Vowing to escape the handsome man she was sold to, she canâ€™t deny how her traitorous body responds to his touch; and is torn between the things he has to offer; and the thoughts of being a sex toy to this high ranking dangerous member of the Russian Bratva.Living in a world of danger; Sergei takes an immediate interest in a woman that has been captured to be sold as a pleasure slave. He is captivated by her exotic looks and is overwhelmed by a sense of dominant possessiveness; and buys her to take back to Moscow with him as his personal sex toy; underestimating her desire to be free.
author: Mitzi D. Lane
